headline.main: When Doctors 'Google' Their Patients
headline.print_headline: Patient Secrets, Found Online

docs.abstract: Doctors do look up their patients on Google. I don’t know of a single physician, resident or attending who hasn’t done so. But it surprises me that more physicians don’t pause and think about what it means for the patient-doctor relationship.
